page.title: 07INDUSTRY RODBOROUGH STROUD
page.content: {Winstone's of Rodborough Common { }A family business,making ice cream which started in l925.On average they sell 2,000 gallons per week depending on the time of the year.They sell ice cream from the factory shop, via freezer centres and from their l4 vans which visit local towns and villages.Six people work in the factory. The van drivers are self-employed and sell about l4 flavours of ice cream, which keeps about 3 months under the correct conditions.The ice cream has won National Ice Cream Manufacturing Awards, and in l984 they came third out of 500 entries. { }
